orthopedic drill bits

orthopedic drill bits from Changzhou Nile

Changzhou Nile has a long term involved with making the orthopedic drill bits, both normal shaft drill bits and quick coupling drill bits, with different specifications.

The orthopedic drill bits of Changzhou Nile use the medical stainless steel, with good chemical composition and mechanical property.

The orthopedic drill bits are favored by the customers at home and abroad. The sales manager of Changzhou Nile focus on they will make the orthopedic drill bits according their customers’ requirements, such as: drawing, sample, specifications and etc.

Quick Coupling Drill Bits, Orthopedic

Quick Coupling Drill Bits, Orthopedic

Quick coupling drill bits of our company are the unique orthopedic instruments made by our company. We use medical stainless steel for producing this kind of orthopedic instruments, with many specifications, different lengths, diameters, cutting flute length. By the way, we can make the drill bits by our customers’ requirements, i.e. customer-made way. Please feel free to contact us for more information.

Contact: Mr.Nile, Manager

Changzhou Nile Industries Co., Ltd.

Professional Orthopedic Drill-Bit Manufacturing in China

Professional Orthopedic Drill-Bit Manufacturing in China
Changzhou Nile Co. offers orthopedic drill bits for a variety of orthopedics procedures. The Nile drill bits are made from high quality, hardened, stainless steel, the company says. The flute length on the drill bits is with different lengths, which allows for adequate room for bone chips. The Nile drill bits come in a variety of sizes and have a smooth shaft. The drill bits have precision ground points that helps prevent the bit from walking.
Changzhou Nile Industries Co., Ltd.
Add: Changzhou, Jiangsu, China Zip:213015
Orthopedic Instrument Sales Dept,
